name: SpellVania
description:
A little metroidvania game, made for the Metroidvania Month 18 game jam.

Josh sets off to meet his friend Amy, but along the way he discovers that things are not what they used to be...

Controls

Left/Right Arrows: Move

Up Arrow: Jump

Down Arrow: Transform to cat and back (when applicable)

[SPACE]: Attack/Interact/Proceed dialogues

[ESC]: Pause/Settings

Credits

Characters and portals from Elthen's Pixel Art Shop.

Platform tiles, props, effects and backgrounds from Ansimuz's Sunny Land collection, Mountain Dusk Parallax background and Parallax Backgrounds: Caves.

UI elements from Top-Down Adventure Pack by o_lobster.

Speech balloon from Kenney's Emotes Pack.

Music from  Ocean Music Pack by leohpaz.

SFX from Dialog Text Sound Effects and RPG Essentials SFX.

Font: VT323, title font: Eater
